page.title: 16MEDIA continued
page.content: People are welcome to express their views. Lettters from dog owners are frequent and many think that, as they pay licences, dogs should be allowed a space to walk around in. There are not very many letters against dogs. Only a few people write about nuclear war as most people do not know much about it. The main office is at 43 Botley Road, Park Gate, Southampton. {RELIGION About one third of the people in our D Block go to Church, and they go to Botley, Curdridge or Wickham Church, depending on which is nearest. The other people go to to the main Church festivals. All the nearby churches are Church of England but there is a Methodist Church near Botley. Most young are baptised and confirmed in their local church but there are not as many church marriages
